Daniel Thinfen.description: Daniel (CS '26) helps with the day to day operations of poker club. Outside of poker, he enjoys skiing, golfing, and ultimate frisbee.

Ethan Taylor.description: Ethan (Business '24) helps improve the social aspect of poker club. He is also involved with the Undergraduate Consulting Club.

Allen Yang.description: Allen (Math & CS '27) is a poker enthusiast who won our 2023 Heads Up Tournament. Outside of poker club, he is involved with CMU's premier math contest: CMIMC.

Andrew Park.description: Andy is a PhD student at CMU SCS. He is broadly interested in theoretical and applied cryptography.

Anthony Jiang.description: Anthony (IS '24) was a committed poker club member and cash game player, who reached Radiant in Valorant.

David Krajewski.description: David (CS '25) is currently interested in the world of AI and startups.

Nakul Goenka.description: Nakul (ECE '22) played an important role in reviving poker club in 2022.

Samvitti Sharma.description: Vitti (CS '25) played an important role in reviving poker club in 2022.
